TypeSignature.Value: public class LinkButton : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkButton extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
Public Class LinkButton Inherits WebControl Implements IButtonControl, IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 在 Web 網頁上顯示超連結樣式按鈕控制項。

span.span: Displays a hyperlink-style button control on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [LinkButton 控制項和驗證LinkButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用建立超連結樣式按鈕在網頁上的控制項。Use the control to create a hyperlink-style button on the Web page. 控制項具有的相同外觀控制項，但具有相同的功能，為控制項。The control has the same appearance as a control, but has the same functionality as a control. 如果您想要連結至另一個網頁，當按一下控制項時，請考慮使用控制項。If you want to link to another Web page when the control is clicked, consider using the control. > [!NOTE] > 控制項呈現至用戶端瀏覽器的 JavaScript。The control renders JavaScript to the client browser. 用戶端瀏覽器必須啟用這個控制項的正常運作的 JavaScript。The client browser must have JavaScript enabled for this control to function properly. 如需有關用戶端指令碼的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 用戶端指令碼在 ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa). 您可以建立提交按鈕或命令按鈕。You can create either a Submit button or a Command button. 送出 按鈕並沒有與其相關聯的命令名稱。A Submit button does not have a command name associated with it. 按鈕只是張貼至伺服器的網頁。The button simply posts the Web page back to the server. 根據預設，控制項是送出 按鈕。By default, a control is a Submit button. 您可以提供的事件處理常式時按一下 [提交] 按鈕，以程式設計方式控制動作的事件執行。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked. 相反地，在命令按鈕的命令名稱與按鈕相關聯，例如`Sort`。On the other hand, a Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`. 設定屬性，以指定的命令名稱。Set the property to specify the command name. 這可讓您建立多個在 Web 上的控制項頁面上，並以程式設計方式判斷哪些按一下控制項時。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. 您也可以使用屬性的命令按鈕，以提供要搜尋的執行，例如指定遞增順序的命令的其他資訊。You can also use the property with a Command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as specifying ascending order. 您也可以提供的事件處理常式時按一下 [命令] 按鈕，以程式設計方式控制動作的事件執行。You can also provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the action performed when the Command button is clicked. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在控制項。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## LinkButton 控制項和驗證LinkButton Controls and Validation 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 頁面驗證判斷輸入的控制項要與驗證控制項在頁面上，所有通過驗證的控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 若要避免發生頁面驗證，將屬性設`false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web site 專案位於本主題隨附了：[下載](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192872)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192872). 下列範例示範如何建立顯示在文字控制項控制按一下連結時。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that displays text in a control when the link is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that represents the parsed element.

summary.span: 通知控制項，項目 (XML 或者 HTML) 已經被剖析，並將項目加入至控制項的 物件。

span.span: Notifies the control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the control's object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，在自訂伺服器控制項，讓它將 text 屬性剖析的物件的 text 屬性，已剖析的物件是否物件，或設為空白字串，否則為。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it either sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a object, or to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

.property instance bool CausesValidation
Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CausesValidation : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出按一下 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果按一下 控制項時會執行驗證，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 頁面驗證判斷輸入的控制項要與驗證控制項在頁面上，所有通過驗證的控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 您可以指定 （或判斷） 是否在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時藉由按下控制項屬性。You can specify (or determine) whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is clicked by using the property. 若要避免執行驗證，將屬性設`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 這個屬性通常會設定為`false`重設或清除 按鈕，以防止在按一下按鈕時執行驗證。This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 時的值屬性設定為`true`，您也可以使用屬性設為其指定驗證群組名稱控制項引發驗證。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以防止發生頁面驗證。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 請注意如何方法會獨立啟用每個驗證控制項。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButtonCausesValidation/CS/linkbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButtonCausesValidation/VB/linkbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

member this.Click : EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用於沒有命令名稱相關聯控制項，如果是送出 按鈕。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control, as in the case of a Submit button. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示一則訊息時按一下控制項時。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command;
.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command
Public Custom Event Command As CommandEventHandler
public: virtual event System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventHandler ^ Command;
member this.Command : System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常時使用的命令名稱，例如`Sort`，相關聯控制項。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 這可讓您建立多個在 Web 上的控制項頁面上，並以程式設計方式判斷哪些按一下控制項時。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 就會引發事件的形式的控制階層架構透過`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示一則訊息時按一下控制項時。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: Button Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

summary.span: 取得或設定與相關的 屬性一起傳遞至 事件處理常式的選擇性 (Optional) 引數。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument passed to the event handler along with the associated property.

value.span: 與相關的 屬性一起傳遞至 事件處理常式的選擇性引數。

span.span: An optional argument passed to the event handler along with the associated property.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的引數，可補充屬性。Use the property to specify an argument that complements the property. > [!NOTE] > 僅使用時，屬性通常是屬性設定。The property is typically only used when the property is set. 屬性補充項目屬性可讓您提供任何其他要執行的命令相關資訊。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide any additional information about the command to perform. 比方說，您可以設定屬性，以`Sort`並設定屬性設`Ascending`，指定要以遞增順序排序的命令。For example, you can set the property to `Sort` and set the property to `Ascending` to specify a command to sort in ascending order. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性可指定選擇性引數，可補充的命令名稱控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an optional argument that complements the command name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定與 控制項相關的命令名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control.

summary.span: 這個值與 屬性一起傳遞至 事件處理常式。

span.span: This value is passed to the event handler along with the property.
The command name of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您有多個控制項在網頁上，使用屬性來指定，或決定的命令名稱相關聯按下的控制項。When you have multiple controls on a Web page, use the property to specify or determine the command name associated with the control clicked. 您可以設定屬性與任何字串，識別要執行的命令。You can set the property with any string that identifies the command to perform. 您就可以透過程式設計方式決定的命令名稱控制項，並執行適當的動作。You can then programmatically determine the command name of the control and perform the appropriate actions. 其他資訊的命令，例如`Ascending`排序順序，可以使用來自指定屬性。Additional information about the command, such as an `Ascending` sort order, can be specified by using the property. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的命令名稱控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a command name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: Button Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetPostBackOptions () As PostBackOptions
protected: virtual System::Web::UI::PostBackOptions ^ GetPostBackOptions();
abstract member GetPostBackOptions : unit -> System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions override this.GetPostBackOptions : unit -> System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions

summary.span: 建立表示 控制項之回傳行為的 物件。

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: ，表示 控制項的回傳行為。

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件，表示控制項之回傳行為。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 物件通常再傳遞到方法，來取得用戶端指令碼函式的參考，叫用時，會導致伺服器回傳至頁面。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page. 擴充時，這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用類別。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 您可以覆寫衍生類別來修改回傳控制項的選項按鈕，或按一下按鈕時，呼叫用戶端指令碼中的方法。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓標準的回傳選項會設定。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

related.span: 在 ASP.NET Web Pages 中的用戶端指令碼

span.span: Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常用於沒有命令名稱相關聯控制項，如果是送出 按鈕。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control, as in the case of a Submit button. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示其按一下控制項時。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display which control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 取得或設定當 控制項的 事件引發時執行的用戶端指令碼

span.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised

value.span: 當 控制項的 事件引發時執行的用戶端指令碼。

span.span: The client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定時執行的其他用戶端指令碼控制項的就會引發事件。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when the control's event is raised. 您為這個屬性會呈現在指定的指令碼控制項的`OnClick`屬性除了控制項的預先定義的用戶端指令碼。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定其他的用戶端指令碼時執行按一下控制項時。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.OnClientClick/CS/linkbutton.onclientclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.OnClientClick/VB/linkbutton.onclientclickvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常時使用的命令名稱，例如`Sort`，相關聯控制項。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 這可讓您建立多個在 Web 上的控制項頁面上，並以程式設計方式判斷哪些按一下控制項時。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 就會引發事件的形式的控制階層架構透過`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示其按一下控制項時。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display which control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會通知控制項，來執行任何預先呈現的必要步驟，再儲存到用戶端的檢視狀態和呈現內容。The method notifies the control to perform any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content to the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，讓框線永遠不會顯示在自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that a border is never displayed in a custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_linkbutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_linkbutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_linkbutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_linkbutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

.property instance string PostBackUrl
Public Overridable Property PostBackUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ PostBackUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PostBackUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定當按下 控制項時，從目前的網頁要張貼到之目的地網頁的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 當按下 控制項時，從目前的網頁要張貼到之目的地網頁的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會使頁面回傳到本身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您執行後使用跨網頁控制項。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. 設定至網頁的 URL，以張貼時 屬性按一下控制項時。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定 Page2.aspx 會導致頁面，其中包含控制項来張貼到`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying Page2.aspx causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果您未指定的值屬性，在網頁回傳到本身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當執行與伺服器端驗證控制項跨網頁回傳時，您應該檢查網頁的屬性是`true`之前先處理回傳。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 在跨網頁回傳時，[檢查] 頁面會是 PreviousPage。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage. 下列 Visual Basic 程式碼示範如何做到這點：The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 如需有關跨網頁公佈技術的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 中的跨網頁公佈](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行跨網頁回傳的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 當使用者按一下控制項，在網頁回傳至指定的目標頁面的文字方塊中輸入的值屬性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要執行此範例中中,，您也必須在此程式碼範例的相同目錄中，以建立 [目標] 頁面的檔案。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 在下一個範例中提供了目標網頁的程式碼。The code for the target page is provided in the next example. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/linkbutton.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/linkbutton.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取從另一個頁面使用的回傳值屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此頁面取得前一個頁面的回傳，並向使用者顯示的字串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果您嘗試直接執行此程式碼範例，您就會收到錯誤，因為值`text`欄位會`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `text` field will be `null`. 請改用此程式碼建立的目標頁面，並將檔案放在與前一個範例的程式碼相同的目錄。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 檔案的名稱必須對應到指定的值在上述範例中的屬性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 當您執行先前範例的程式碼時，此頁面將會自動執行跨網頁回傳發生時。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/linkbutton.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/linkbutton.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將所轉譯 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性會指出 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0; 否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指示如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

.property instance string Text
Public Overridable Property Text As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在 控制項上的文字標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption displayed on the control.

value.span: 顯示在 控制項上的文字標題。

span.span: The text caption displayed on the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷要在顯示標題控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the caption to display on the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定會出現在標題控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption that appears on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: Button Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將在頁面上的驗證控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以單獨在頁面上的其他驗證群組進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性來指定驗證群組的名稱，回傳至伺服器時，控制項引發驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 這個屬性沒有作用時，才的值屬性設定為`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員的驗證控制項會驗證當控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值而屬性設定為`true`，當控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有頁面上不會指派給驗證群組的驗證控制項。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定所要的控制項時驗證控制項回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls that are to be validated when a control posts back to the server. 此頁面包含三個文字方塊中，從使用者擷取資料，以及三個控制，以確保該使用者不會離開 [文字] 方塊空白。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制的前兩個文字方塊位於`PersonalInfoGroup`驗證群組和控制中的第三個文字方塊是`LocationInfoGroup`驗證群組。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 當`LinkButton1`按下時，驗證群組中的控制項`PersonalInfoGroup`會進行驗證。When `LinkButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 當`LinkButton2`按下時，只在驗證群組中的控制項`LocationInfoGroup`會進行驗證。When `LinkButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.ValidationGroup/CS/linkbutton.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.ValidationGroup/VB/linkbutton.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
